Telesales Executive Job at Rosabon Financial Services




        
    

        
        Rosabon Financial Services (RFS) Limited is an Award winning Rosabon Financial Services is member of the Concept Group is licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria, CBN on April 22, 1993, and being a long-standing member of the Equipment Leasing Association of Nigeria (ELAN), the organization has evolved into Nigeria’s leading Non-Banking Financial Intermediary and Equipment Leasing firm focused on niche and general markets.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Telesales Executive
Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Telesales Executive is responsible for driving revenue growth by engaging potential and existing customers through outbound and inbound calls.
	The role focuses on converting leads into sales, maintaining accurate records of all interactions, and ensuring excellent customer service throughout the sales cycle.
	Success in this role is measured by the ability to meet or exceed monthly sales targets, build strong customer relationships, and accurately document all sales activities.


What You’ll Do


	Make outbound calls to prospective clients and convert leads into sales.
	Achieve and exceed monthly sales targets.
	Maintain accurate records of calls and sales activities.
	Provide excellent customer service, handling inquiries and resolving issues professionally.
	Prepare and submit timely sales reports.


What We’re Looking For


	Minimum of OND/HND/Bachelor’s degree.
	1–3 years of telesales or customer service experience preferred.
	Strong communication and negotiation skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and CRM tools.
	Ability to manage difficult or high-profile clients with confidence.
	Goal-oriented and comfortable working in a target-driven environment.


Salary
N70,000 - N100,000 Monthly. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: Charity.Igwe@conceptgroup-ng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Content Creator Job at MMT Consults




        
    

        
        MMT Consults is a dynamic Human Resource Consulting and General Services firm dedicated to delivering innovative, practical, and sustainable solutions that empower organizations to achieve excellence. We partner with businesses across diverse sectors to optimize their people, processes, and performance, ensuring growth, efficiency, and long-term success.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator

Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary

	We are seeking to hire a very creative Content Creator who will be responsible for developing, producing, and managing engaging content that promotes the store’s makeup and beauty products across digital platforms.
	This role involves creating high-quality photos, videos, tutorials, and written content to enhance brand awareness, drive online engagement, and increase sales.


Qualifications and Skills


	Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent experience in Marketing, Mass Communication, Digital Media, or related fields
	3 - 4 years of proven experience as a content creator, social media manager, or similar role, preferably in the beauty industry.
	Strong knowledge of makeup, skincare, and beauty trends.
	Proficiency in content creation tools (Canva, Photoshop, Premiere Pro, CapCut, Lightroom, etc.).
	Excellent photography, videography, and editing skills.
	Strong copywriting and storytelling ability.
	Familiarity with social media algorithms and digital marketing strategies.
	Creative, trend-savvy, and detail-oriented.


Salary
N140,000 - N150,000 monthly.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their application to: mmtconsults@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Digital Marketer",
  "description": "MMT Consults is a dynamic Human Resource Consulting and General Services firm dedicated to delivering innovative, practical, and sustainable solutions that empower organizations to achieve excellence. We partner with businesses across diverse sectors to optimize their people, processes, and performance, ensuring growth, efficiency, and long-term success.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type:

Job Description


	We are on the lookout for an experienced and innovative Go High Level Expert Digital Marketer with a strong background in the beauty industry.
	The ideal candidate will have at least 4 years of hands-on experience in digital marketing, showcasing a deep understanding of social media management and a creative approach to content creation.


Key Responsibilities


	Campaign Strategy Development: Design and implement comprehensive digital marketing strategies that drive brand awareness, engagement, and conversions within the beauty industry.
	Social Media Management: Oversee social media accounts, creating and curating engaging content that resonates with our audience, while managing community interactions.
	Analytics and Optimization: Utilize strong analytical skills to measure campaign performance, providing insights and recommendations for optimization to maximize ROI.
	Content Creation: Develop high-quality content for various platforms, including social media, blogs, and email marketing, that aligns with brand messaging and engages our target audience.
	Email Marketing: Create and manage email marketing campaigns, including newsletters, promotions, and customer engagement strategies to drive retention and sales.
	Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams to align marketing efforts with overall business objectives and ensure a cohesive brand presence.
	Trend Analysis: Stay updated on industry trends and competitor activities to identify new opportunities and keep our marketing strategies ahead of the curve.
	Manage and grow IDA Beauty social media presence
	Develop and implement impactful marketing strategies
	Utilize SEO knowledge and ads management to optimize online engagement
	Identify and target potential customers, including beauty enthusiasts, influencers, and makeup artists, to increase brand awareness and drive sales.
	Monitor sales performance, analyze market trends, and identify opportunities for growth and expansion in the African market.
	Develop and implement sales strategies to promote IDA Beauty makeup products in the Middle East and Africa market.
	Curate and manage content across all social media platforms
